Headline: Orange Line Service Delayed at Pulaski
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are standing at Pulaski due to fire department activity.  Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are standing at Pulaski due to fire department activity. 

Shuttle buses are available between 35th/Archer and Midway to provide connecting service. At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
